doc.field: Legal Papers Includes legacy to JBM under will of his mother, Martha Buell Plum Munn: correspondence, list of share, charts of financial data; contract with Scott Foresman & Company re Ideas & Forms in English and American Literature written with Homer A. Watt; miscellaneous items: notarial certi­ficate of protest re unpaid check; affidavit re medical discharge of private in JBM's army unit. :­

Watt; miscellaneous items: notarial certi­ficate of protest re unpaid check; affidavit re medical discharge of private in JBM's army unit. :­
